SEARCH
Module com.example.dicegame
Package model.records.dice

Class RegularDice

java.lang.Object
model.records.dice.Dice
model.records.dice.RegularDice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RegularDice extends Dice
RegularDice represents a standard, fair die with equal probabilities for each side. It provides a basic implementation for rolling and returning an image name based on the rolled side.
See Also:

    • returnImageName

      public String returnImageName()
      Returns the image file name for the current side of the dice. The image name is based on the side number and the image directory.
      Specified by:
      returnImageName in class Dice
      Returns:
      a string representing the image file name for the current dice side
